title: ‘Talking Textiles’ launches Dundee Oral History Project (University of Dundee)
text: ( Source : University of Dundee ) Published On Fri 16 Oct 2015 by Grant Hill Dundee 's rich history as a world-leading centre for textiles production will be explored through songs, stories and conversation at an event next week to launch the
